inclusion.criterion: Total thyroidectomy with or without central compartment dissection
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: High risk for intraoperative RLN sacrifice as determined by the treating surgeon
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients unwilling to participate in the trial
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone multiple surgeries, including XRT. However, they may still be eligible if they meet the inclusion criteria.
